word:
Besides the main building, there was a six-room cottage, which could be fitted up for helpers, and a good stable. About half of the twenty acres of land had once been planted out to fruit trees, but during the long drought from which the country had suffered the trees had been allowed to die, except the ornamental trees 


                                     -259- 

and the shrubbery round the buildings, and about seventy olive trees on the terrace.
